info.name: Mastodon Wide and Quiet
info.description: An aggressively minimalist Mastodon reskin. Columns are a comfortable bit wider, all colored boxes are removed, scrollbars are not made annoyingly tiny on Safari. Also boosted toots are in Comic Sans.
info.additionalInfo: Only applies to the flagship instance and my own instance. If you use one of the many other wonderful Mastodon instances out there, you'll have to tweak that. This started life as a copy of justbearcause's Mastodon Wide but very quickly became its own thing.
